title: Ground News - Korean companies offer million-dollar bonuses when employees have children.
text: One of South Korea's most pressing problems is very low birth rate. Both politicians and sociologists are alarmed, and now major South Korean companies are also getting involved. Their employees, who have children, can receive generous financial rewards.
